title: Navaratna Coral & Emerald Motif Haar with South Sea Pearl Accents
features: This contemporary haar features a unique hexagonal pendant design incorporating vibrant corals and diamonds. The necklace strands are composed of South Sea pearls interspersed with emerald beads and coral sections, creating a striking color contrast. The pendant's center boasts a diamond-studded floral motif, surrounded by perfectly cut coral segments. A carved emerald drop adds a touch of traditional South Indian elegance. Handcrafted with meticulous attention to detail, reflecting the legacy of Hyderabadi craftsmanship.
colors: and pearl white. The vibrant red of the corals contrasts beautifully with the lush green emeralds and the classic white of the pearls
creating a rich and auspicious color palette.
occasions: and celebratory events. Its modern design also makes it suitable for upscale parties and cocktail events.
description: This exquisite haar is a fusion of traditional South Indian aesthetics and modern design sensibilities. The use of authentic South Sea pearls, high-quality corals, and brilliant-cut diamonds makes it a valuable heirloom piece. Its unique design and vibrant color combination will ensure you stand out in any crowd. The handcrafted detailing reflects the rich heritage of Hyderabadi jewelry making.
